house_listing.house_description: Huge 4 bedroom w/ 3 full baths! Large master on 1st floor. Freshly painted w/buyers choice of colors! This home has been renovated and features over 2400 sqft of living area (per builder). Seller will help w/ closing cost! Hurry on this one!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Attic Fan, Balcony, Breakfast Room, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced,Garage Door Opener
